question:
The sequence S is defined by \(S_n = S_{n – 1} + S_{n – 2} – 3\) for each integer n ≥ 3. If \(S_1 = 5\) and \(S_2 = 0\), what is the value of \(S_6\)?
(A) –6
(B) –5
(C) –3
(D) –1
(E) 1
